    </title>

    <!--[if IE 7]>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/css/grid/grid-for-ie7.css" type="text/css"/>
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/css/icons/icons-ie7.css" type="text/css"/>

    <![endif]-->

    <script src="http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/underscore.js/1.7.0/underscore-min.js"></script>
    <script src="/static/js/jquery_1.7.1.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="/static/js/libraries-plugins/modernizr.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

    
    

<script type="text/javascript">

var UKCMS = UKCMS || {};

UKCMS.getAmazonVersion = function () {
    // http://docs.aws.amazon.com/silk/latest/developerguide/detecting-silk-ua.html
    var silkMatch = /(?:; ([^;)]+) Build\/.*)?\bSilk\/([0-9._-]+)\b(.*\bMobile Safari\b)?/.exec(navigator.userAgent);
}

UKCMS.getAndroidVersion = function (ua) {
    ua = (ua || navigator.userAgent).toLowerCase();
    var match = ua.match(/android\s([0-9\.]*)/);
    return match ? match[1] : false;
}

UKCMS.getiOSVersion = function (ua) {
    if (/iP(hone|od|ad)/.test(navigator.platform)) {
        // supports iOS 2.0 and later: <http://bit.ly/TJjs1V>
        var v = (navigator.appVersion).match(/OS (\d+)_(\d+)_?(\d+)?/);
        return v ? [parseInt(v[1], 10), parseInt(v[2], 10), parseInt(v[3] || 0, 10)] : false;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

UKCMS.user_status = '';
    //user_status: 'vod-ready',

UKCMS.SETTINGS = {
    days_left_threshold: 3,
    filter_api_base: 'http://api431.thefilter.com/uktv/live',
    is_play_portal: 'false',
    is_vod_watch_page: '' === '' ? false : true,
    itunes_app_url: '',
    google_play_app_url: '',
    amazon_app_url: '',
    primetime_start: parseInt('19', 10),
    site: 'alibi',
    site_name: 'Alibi',
    play_redirect_referrers: 'dave.*uktv|really.*uktv|yesterday.*uktv|drama.*uktv'
};

UKCMS.CLIENT = {
    initialViewportWidth: $(window).width(),
    is_iPad: /iPad/i.test(navigator.userAgent),
    is_iOS: navigator.userAgent.indexOf('iPad') > -1 || navigator.userAgent.indexOf('iPhone') > -1 || navigator.userAgent.indexOf('iPod') > -1,
    is_iOS_version: UKCMS.getiOSVersion(),
    is_android: UKCMS.getAndroidVersion() ? true : false,
    is_amazon: UKCMS.getAmazonVersion() ? true : false,
    is_android_version: UKCMS.getAndroidVersion(),
    is_ie8orLower: $("html").hasClass("lt-ie9"),
    is_ie9orLower: $("html").hasClass("lt-ie10"),
    is_ie10orLower: $("html").hasClass("lt-ie11"),
    theBody: $('body'),
    viewportWidth: $(window).width()
};

UKCMS.URLS = {
    newsletter_signup: '/myuktv/newsletter-signup',
    program_detail: '/tv-guide/detail/0', // 0 is a placeholder for the listing ID
    login: '/cas/login/',
    logout: '/cas/logout/',
    user_profile: '/myprofile/',
    vod_maxi_player: '/video/maxi-player/',
    play_site: 'http://uktvplay.uktv.co.uk'
};

UKCMS.RANDOM_THEMES = {
    isEnabled: true,                  // Random Themes for use in 'js/random-themes.js'
    usesSameBGGradient: false,        // does each random theme bg have its own gradient too?
    excludeByBodyClass: [],           // pages to exclude from random themes, targeted by body class
    numberOfThemes: 1                 // must correspond with number of images
};

UKCMS.VOD = {
    current_video_data: {},           // info about currently selected VoD video as data object - set in vod.js
    use_maxi_player: false,           // use the full screen HTML5 player for tablets? (set for iPad below)
    promo_opts: {
        staff_pick: {
            displayName: 'Staff Pick',
            cssName: 'staff-pick'
        },
        premier: {
            displayName: 'See it first',
            cssName: 'premier'
        },
        celeb_pick: {
            displayName: 'Celeb Pick',
            cssName: 'celeb-pick'
        }
    }
};

// use the VoD maxi player if the user is on an iPad
UKCMS.VOD.use_maxi_player = UKCMS.CLIENT.is_iPad;
</script>

	var _prum = [['id', '52e0f616abe53d6e67000000'],
	             ['mark', 'firstbyte', (new Date()).getTime()]];
	(function() {
	    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]
	      , p = document.createElement('script');
	    p.async = 'async';
	    p.src = '//rum-static.pingdom.net/prum.min.js';
	    s.parentNode.insertBefore(p, s);
	})();
</script>

    facebookAppId = '220731151407495';
    facebookDefaultScope = ["email", "user_about_me", "user_birthday", "user_website"];
    staticUrl = '/static/';
    function facebookJSLoaded(){
        FB.init({appId: facebookAppId, status: false, cookie: true, xfbml: true, oauth: true});
    }
    window.fbAsyncInit = facebookJSLoaded;
    F = new facebookClass(facebookAppId);
    F.load();
</script>

var versaTag = {};
versaTag.id = "281"
versaTag.sync = 0
versaTag.dispType = "js"
versaTag.ptcl = "HTTP"
versaTag.bsUrl = "bs.serving-sys.com/BurstingPipe"
//versaTag.mobile = 1
//VersaTag activity parameters include all conversion parameters including custom parameters. Syntax: "ParamName1":"ParamValue1", "ParamName2":"ParamValue2". ParamValue can be empty.
versaTag.activityParams = {};
versaTag.retargetParams = {
// Static retargeting tags parameters. Syntax: "TagID":"ParamValue1", "TagID":"ParamValue1". ParamValue can be empty.
};
versaTag.dynamicRetargetParams = {
// Dynamic retargeting tags parameters. Syntax: "TagID":"ParamValue1", "TagID":"ParamValue1". ParamValue can be empty.
};
versaTag.conditionalParams = {
// Third party tags conditional parameters. Syntax: "ParamName1":"ParamValue1", "ParamName2":"ParamValue2". ParamValue can be empty.
};
</script>

<noscript>

    <!-- Begin comScore OnClick v1.1.1 code (c) 2004-2009 Copyright Nedstat B.V. All rights reserved -->
<script type="text/javascript" language="JavaScript">
    //<[CDATA[
    function ns_onclick(i,b,c,h,j)
    {
        i.preventDefault();
        var e="";
        if(typeof ns_pixelUrl=="string")
        {
            e=ns_pixelUrl.substring(0,ns_pixelUrl.indexOf("?")+1)}e+=c;
        e+="&ns_type="+h+"&ns_action=view";
        e+="&ns__t="+(new Date()).getTime();
        if(!b)
        {
            b=i.href
        }
        var   d=document.referrer;
        if(d.lastIndexOf("/")==d.length-1)
        {
            d=d.substring(d.lastIndexOf("/"),0)
        }
        if(d.length>0)
        {
            e+="&amp;ns_referrer="+escape(d)
        }
        j=j||"";
        var   f=(i&&i.target&&i.target!="")?(i.target.substring(0,1)=="_")?i.target.substring(1):i.target:"self";
        var g=new Image();
        if(f&&b)
        {
            if(window[f])
            {
                window.ns_softclick_timer=function(k,a)
                {
                    return function()
                    {
                        if(window.ns_softclick_timeout)
                        {
                            window.clearTimeout(window.ns_softclick_timeout)
                        }
                        g.onload=g.onerror=function(){return};
                        window[((window[k])?k:"self")].location.href=a
                    }
                }(f,b);
                ns_softclick_timeout=window.setTimeout("ns_softclick_timer()",5000);
                g.onload=g.onerror=window.ns_softclick_timer
            }
            else
            {
                window.open(b,f,j)
            }
        }
        g.src=e;
        return false;
    };
    // ]]>
</script>
<!-- End comScore OnClick v1.1.1 code -->

<!-- Begin CMC v.1.0.1 -->
<script type="text/javascript">
    // <![CDATA[
    function sitestat(u){
        var d=document,l=d.location;
        ns_pixelUrl=u+"&ns__t="+(new Date().getTime());
        u=ns_pixelUrl+"&ns_c="+((d.characterSet)?d.characterSet:d.defaultCharset)+"&ns_ti="+escape(d.title)+"&ns_jspageurl="+escape(l&&l.href?l.href:d.URL)+"&ns_referrer="+escape(d.referrer);
        (d.images)?new Image().src=u:d.write('<'+'p><img src="'+u+'" height="1" width="1" alt="*"/><'+'/p>');
    };
    sitestat("//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/alibi/s?name=hubpage.homepage&uktv_campaign=VERSA1");
    // ]]>
</script>
<noscript><p><img src="//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/alibi/s?name=hubpage.homepage&uktv_campaign=VERSA1" height="1" width="1" alt="*"/></p></noscript>
<!-- End CMC -->

<!-- Assign click tracking code to any annotated links
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("a[uktv\\:track-link-group]").click(function(e){
            ns_onclick(this,'',$(this).attr('uktv:track-link-name')+'&uktv_linkpos='+$(this).attr('uktv:track-link-group'),$(this).attr('uktv:track-link-type'));
        })
    });
</script> -->

<script type="text/javascript">
    function galleryPageView(){
        sitestat("//uk.sitestat.com/uktv/alibi/s?name=hubpage.homepage&uktv_campaign=VERSA1");
    }
</script>

        <script>
            // Remove the above '#leaderboard' if viewing on a low screen width
            (function () {  // isolate var inside function
                var viewportWidth = $(window).width();
                if (viewportWidth < 720) {
                    $('#leaderboard').remove();
                }
            })();
        </script>

<!-- NAV BAR
     this container div retains height of 'nav-bar' to avoid content jumping when the nav-bar becomes 'sticky'
     the height is applied by 'js/header/sticky-header.js' to match the current height of the nav-bar
-->
<div id="nav-placeholder" style="min-height: 50px">

<!-- the nav bar: position:fixed is applied by 'js/header/sticky-header.js'
     as a css class to make it sticky -->
<div id="nav-bar">

    <!-- we need this div because it lets it's children get absolutely
         positioned when the NAV-BAR itself gets absolutely positioned -->
    <div style="position: relative">
        <div class="nav-wrap position-relative">

            <a id="home-btn" class="home active" href="/" title="Return to the home page"><i class="icon-home icon"></i><span class="hide">Home</span></a>

            
                <form id="site-search" method="GET" action="/search/" role="search">
                    <!-- we need this div because it lets it's children get absolutely positioned
                         inside this form when the form itself gets absolutely positioned -->
                    <div style="position: relative">
                        <!-- the following DOM tree allows us to achieve a "fluid/fixed" layout,
                             where the input is fluid and the button area is fixed -->
                        <div class="input-holder label-in-input">
                            <label for="site-search-input" class="label secondary-font" id="site-search-label">Search <span class="hidden-tablet-landscape">Alibi</span></label>
                            <input id="site-search-input" autocomplete="off" data-text="" type="search" name="q">
                        </div>
                        <!-- this container allows us to have a fixed button
                             area while the width of the input is fluid  -->
                        <div class="button-holder">
                            <button type="reset" id="site-search-clr-btn"><i class="icon-delete"></i><span class="hide">Clear</span></button>
                            <button type="submit" id="site-search-btn"><i class="icon-search icon"></i><span class="hide">Search</span></button>
                            <a id="site-search-close" href="#" title="Cancel this search">Cancel</a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </form>
            

            
            

            
            <a id="menu-btn" class="expand-menu" href="#" title="Open the main menu"><span class="text">Main Menu</span><i class="icon icon-menu"></i><span class="clear-float"></span></a>

        </div><!-- /.nav-wrap -->

<!--

    Predictive Search Results Templates
    -----------------------------------
    This template is used by the predictive search Javascript to display search results as the user types,
    the Javascript & CSS can be found in `predictive_search.js` and `predictive-search.less`

 -->

<script type="text/template" id="play_search_result_template">
    <div class="pred-results <%= data.non_sticky_css_class %>">
        <div class="pred-results-container">

            <a id="pred-results-close" class="pred-results-close" href="#" title="Close these search results"><i class="icon icon-close"></i></a>

            <% if (data.results) { %>
                <ul class="results-list">
                    <% _.each( data.results, function( item ){ %>
                        <li class="play-pred-item">
                            <a href="<%= item.link %>">
                                <span class="title"><i class="icon <% if (item.is_collection) { %>icon-collection<% } else { %>icon-tv<% } %>"></i> <%= item.title %></span>
                                <span class="arrow"><span class="num-ep"><%= item.ep_count %></span> <i class="icon icon-right"></i></span>
                            </a>
                        </li>
                    <% }); %>
                </ul>
            <% } %>

            <% if (data.no_search) { %>
                <h1 class="no-results-title">What do you fancy watching?</h1>
            <% } %>

            <% if (data.no_results) { %>
                <h1 class="no-results-title">No results found for <span><%= data.query %></span></h1>
                <p class="no-results-text">We used everything but the metal detector, <br />but it's just not here&hellip;</p>
            <% } %>

        </div>
    </div>
</script>


<script type="text/template" id="search_result_template">
    <div class="pred-results page-element <%= data.non_sticky_css_class %>">

        <a href="#"></a>

        <div class="container">

            <a id="pred-results-close" class="pred-results-close" href="#" title="Close these search results"><i class="icon icon-close"></i></a>

            <div class="row">
                <div class="span6">
                    <h3 class="title pred-search-title">Shows</h3>
                    <% _.each( data.brands, function( item, index ){ %>
                        <div class="pred-item-img item<%= index +1%> cascade-appear fade-in" style="transition-delay: <%= index * 200%>ms">
                            <a href="<% if (item.vod_link) { %><%= item.vod_link %><% } else { %><%= item.link %><% } %>" title="<%= item.title %>" class="img-zoom result-img">
                                <img src="<%= item.t_thumb %>" />
                                <% if (item.vod_link) { %>
                                <div class="bottom-inline-row">
                                    <i class="icon-vod icon-large icon"></i>
                                    <div class="text-display">Watch now</div>
                                </div>
                                <% } %>
                            </a>
                            <h5 class="teaser-title">

                                <% if (item.vod_link) { %>
                                    <i class="icon-vod small icon"></i>
                                <% } else { %>
                                    <i class="icon-brandpage small icon"></i>
                                <% } %>

                                <% if (item.vod_link) { %>
                                    <a href="<%= item.vod_link %>" title="<%= item.title %>"><%= item.title %></a>
                                <% } else { %>
                                    <a href="<%= item.link %>" title="<%= item.title %>"><%= item.title %></a>
                                <% } %>
                            </h5>

                            <span class="clear-float"></span>
                        </div>

                    <% }); %>

                </div>
                <div class="span6">
                    <hr class="keyline"  />

                    <h3 class="title pred-search-title">Other Categories</h3>

                    <% if (data.other_results.length === 0) { %>
                        <div class="pred-item">
                            <p class="teaser-text">No more results found</p>
                        </div>
                    <% } %>

                    <% _.each( data.other_results, function(item,index){ %>

                        <!-- add div.col around first 4 results and div.col2 around the rest (for two col layout on large screens) -->
                        <% if (item.index === 0) { %><div class="col1"><% } %>
                        <% if (item.index === 4) { %></div><div class="col2"> <% } %>

                        <div class="pred-item cascade-appear fade-in" style="transition-delay: <%= index * 75%>ms">
                            <h5 class="teaser-title"><i class="icon-<%= item.c_type %> small icon"></i> <a href="<%= item.link %>"><%= item.title %></a></h5>
                        </div>

                        <% if (item.index === (data.other_results.length - 1)) { %> </div> <% } %>

                    <% }); %>
                </div>
            </div><!-- /.row -->
        </div>

        <div class="show-all">
            <nav class="btn-holder show-more center">
                <a class="show-more-btn" href="<%= data.show_all_query %>" title="See all search results">Show all</a>
            </nav>
        </div>

    </div>
</script>

        <!--<div class="redirect-notice">-->
            <!--<div class="inner-container">-->
                <!--<div class="icon-container">-->
                    <!--<i class="icon large icon-delete"></i>-->

        <!--</div>-->
    </div>
    

    <div id="total-wrapper">

        </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    



    <div id="main-container" class="main-container container clearfix"> <!-- center grid and set up main-content grid -->

        
        <main role="main" class="content-wrapper" >

            
            
            

                <div id="hub_header">
                    
                    
                </div>

                <div id="main-content">

            <h6 class="teaser-title smaller auto-ellipsis two-lines">
                <a href="/murdoch-mysteries/video/making-murdoch-what-lies-buried/" title="The entire episode is filmed within the station house and ...">
                    <i class="icon-shortformvideo icon"></i>Making Murdoch: What Lies Buried
                </a>
            </h6>
            
        </div>

        <p class="teaser">The entire episode is filmed within the station house and had to be written like a play.</p>
    </div>
    <hr class="keyline">

                                            
                                        </div>
                                    
                                
                            
                                
                                
                                    
                                        <div class="row horizontal" data-items-per-row="1">
                                            
                                                
    <div class="span2 mobile-row img">
        <a href="/murdoch-mysteries/video/making-murdoch-high-voltage/" title="Making Murdoch: High Voltage" class="img-zoom video-teaser">

            


    <img data-url="http://res.cloudinary.com/uktv/image/upload/t_XX/v1421856962/mtnmb65erawquoozx7ll.jpg" src="/static/img/placeholder-16-by-9.png" alt="Making Murdoch: High Voltage">


            
                <i class="icon-shortformvideo small icon"></i>
            
        </a>
    </div>
    <div class="span6 mobile-row">
        <div class="titles">
            <h6 class="teaser-title smaller auto-ellipsis two-lines">
                <a href="/murdoch-mysteries/video/making-murdoch-high-voltage/" title="Two Thomas Edison&#39;s in one episode!">
                    <i class="icon-shortformvideo icon"></i>Making Murdoch: High Voltage
                </a>
            </h6>
            
        </div>

        <p class="teaser">Two Thomas Edison&#39;s in one episode!</p>
    </div>
    <hr class="keyline">

                                            
                                        </div>
                                    
                                
                            
                                
                                
                                    
                                        <div class="row horizontal" data-items-per-row="1">
                                            
                                                
    <div class="span2 mobile-row img">
        <a href="/murdoch-mysteries/video/making-murdoch-murdoch-appreciation-society/" title="Making Murdoch: The Murdoch Appreciation Society" class="img-zoom video-teaser">

            


    <img data-url="http://res.cloudinary.com/uktv/image/upload/t_XX/v1421856822/fj0eh3lzromenrswzd4v.jpg" src="/static/img/placeholder-16-by-9.png" alt="Making Murdoch: The Murdoch Appreciation Society">


            
                <i class="icon-shortformvideo small icon"></i>
            
        </a>
    </div>
    <div class="span6 mobile-row">
        <div class="titles">

                    <i class="icon-shortformvideo icon"></i>Making Murdoch: The Murdoch Appreciation Society
                </a>
            </h6>
            
        </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    //This will create an async <script> to load the FreeWheel LinkTag2 js.
    (function() {
        var profilePath = "uktv_display";
        window._fw_linktag_params = {
            scan_delay : 0,
            server : "2a7e9.v.fwmrm.net",
            network_id : "174057",
            profile : "g_js",
            other_global_params : "csid=alibi/hubpage",
            key_values :  "uktvid=VERSA1"
        };

        var e = function(){
            if(document.addEventListener) document.removeEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',e,false);
            else window.detachEvent('onload',e);
            window._fw_page_ready = true;
        };
        if(document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',e,false);
        else if(window.attachEvent) window.attachEvent('onload',e);

        var lt = document.createElement('script');
        lt.type = 'text/javascript';
        lt.async = true;

        lt.src = "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/"+ profilePath +"/LinkTag2.js";
        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(lt, s);
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function fw_config()
    {
        return{

            //network_id : "174057", // Live
            networkId : 174057,
            siteSectionNetworkId:174057,
            videoAssetNetworkId:174057,
            fw_server:"http://2a7e7.v.fwmrm.net/ad/p/1",
            amLocation_js: "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/c4_brightcove_live/AdManager.js",
            //cb_profile_js: "c4_brightcovehtml5_test",
            cb_profile_js: "c4_brightcovehtml5_live",
            assetIdField: "housenum",
            siteSection:"alibi/hubpage",
            autoplay:false,
            
                amLocation:"http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/uktv_short_live/AdManager.swf",
            
            fw_keyvalues: "uktvid=VERSA1"
        };
    }

    function adsReload(){
        $('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_1').remove();
        $('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_2').remove();
        $('img#_fw_cb_VPNT_3').remove();

        var lt = document.createElement('script');
        lt.type = 'text/javascript';
        lt.async = true;

        lt.src = "http://adm.fwmrm.net/p/uktv_display/LinkTag2.js";
        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(lt, s);

        window._fw_page_ready = true;
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript"> function crtg_getCookie(a){var b,c,d,e=document.cookie.split(";");for(b=0;b<e.length;b++){c=e[b].substr(0,e[b].indexOf("="));d=e[b].substr(e[b].indexOf("=")+1);c=c.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"");if(c==a){return unescape(d)}}return""}var crtg_nid="1065";var crtg_cookiename="cto2_channel4";var crtg_content=crtg_getCookie(crtg_cookiename);var crtg_rnd=Math.floor(Math.random()*99999999999);var crtg_url="http://rtax.criteo.com/delivery/rta/rta.js?netid="+escape(crtg_nid);crtg_url+="&cookieName="+escape(crtg_cookiename);crtg_url+="&rnd="+crtg_rnd;crtg_url+="&varName=crtg_content";var crtg_script=document.createElement("script");crtg_script.type="text/javascript";crtg_script.src=crtg_url;crtg_script.async=true;if(document.getElementsByTagName("head").length>0)document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(crtg_script);else if(document.getElementsByTagName("body").length>0)document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(crtg_script) </script>


    
    <script type="text/javascript">

    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
    (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
    m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
    })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-1623692-15');
    // Is logged in dimension
    ga('set', 'dimension1', 'False');
    // Ad Campaign IDs dimension
    ga('set', 'dimension7', 'VERSA1');

    
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    

    

    // Add tracking code for iFrames

    if($('body').hasClass('iframe-detail'))
    {
        var iFrameSrc = document.getElementById('the_iframe').src;

        _gaq.push(function() {
            var pageTracker = _gat._getTrackerByName();
            var iframe = document.getElementById('the_iframe');
            iframe.src = pageTracker._getLinkerUrl(iFrameSrc);
        });
    }

    // Manual google analytics page view call
    function gPageView(){
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }

    $(document).ready(function () {
        $("a[uktv\\:track-link-group]").click(function(e){
            ga('send', 'event', 'ClickTrack', $(this).attr('uktv:track-link-group'), $(this).attr('uktv:track-link-name'));
        })
    });

</script>

    
    
    
    
    

    

    
    <script src="/static/js/twitter-bootstrap/tab.js"></script>

</body>

</html>
